publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1975 Mr Brian Monteith: Midlothian Council’s Proposals to Boundary Commission—That the Parliament views with concern Midlothian Council’s proposals to the Boundary Commission for six wards of three members each in respect of the new STV elections for local government; believes that this will not deliver proportionality in the spirit of the Local Governance (Scotland) Act 2004, and would express regret if this proposal represented an attempt by the Scottish Labour Party to subvert proportionality for local government.
